clauses.question: Do you have any other comments you'd like to make?
clauses.notes:
All forms of pollution need to be reduced and carbon should not be the only targeted element. Our waters are being poisoned by

 nitrate leakage and methane from dairy is more deadly than carbon. ALL FORMS OF POLLUTION NEED TO BE REDUCED BY MAKING
 THE POLLUTERS PAY TOTAL COSTS OF CLEAN UP.
